articles.author: Jamie Smyth, Myles McCormick
articles.title: US shale industry's $200bn dealmaking wave redraws energy landscape - Financial Times
articles.description: Consolidation battle is forcing shrinking number of oil companies to look further afield for new prospects
articles.content:
Dealmaking in US oil and gas has surged to almost $200bn in the past year as the biggest producers compete to swallow up rivals in a race for scale that has redrawn the national energy landscape.

articles.title: Anglo chief admits selling De Beers is biggest challenge - Financial Times
articles.description: Miner has pledged to dispose of or list world’s biggest diamond business even as market remains weak
articles.content: Anglo American chief executive Duncan Wanblad has admitted that selling the diamond business De Beers will be the hardest part of a radical restructuring the miner must deliver after rejecting a £39b… [+3255 chars]
